componentInstanceProperties.name: filterCriteria
componentInstanceProperties.value: ((Status__c !='Cancelled' AND (Delivery_Date__c <> NULL AND Collection_Date__c > TODAY)) or (Status__c = 'Awaiting Supplier Confirmation'))

componentInstanceProperties.name: filterCriteria
componentInstanceProperties.value: ((Delivery_Date__c <= TODAY and (Collection_Date__c >= TODAY OR Collection_Date__c = NULL)) and Status__c <> 'Cancelled')
